where rownum > (#{pagenum} - 1 ) * #{amount} and rownum <= #{pagenum} * 20
SELECT pallet_num FROM b_stock WHERE product_barcode IS null

SELECT a.product_code, p.product_name, pg.product_group_name, b.business_name, c.country_name, p.price, arrive_num_total FROM ( SELECT product_code, SUM(arrive_num) as arrive_num_total FROM b_arrive GROUP BY product_code ) AS a LEFT JOIN b_product p ON a.product_code = p.product_code LEFT JOIN business b ON p.business_code = b.business_code LEFT JOIN country c ON p.country_code = c.country_code LEFT JOIN b_product_group pg ON p.product_group_code = pg.product_group_code
mapper.update: UPDATE b_stock SET arrive_date = #{arrive_date}, stock_num = #{stock_num}, house_code = #{house_code}, product_barcode = #{product_barcode}, product_code = #{product_code} WHERE pallet_num = #{pallet_num}
mapper.select: SELECT p.product_name, c.country_name AS product_country, b.business_name AS product_business, p.price AS product_price FROM b_product p LEFT JOIN country c ON p.country_code = c.country_code LEFT JOIN business b ON p.business_code = b.business_code WHERE p.product_code = #{product_code}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO statement SELECT( case when DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%y%m%d') = LEFT(MAX(statement_code),6) then MAX(statement_code)+1 ELSE CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%y%m%d'),"0001") END) AS statement_code, "입고" AS classification, #{emp_code} AS emp_code, #{emp_name} AS emp_name, #{emp_tel} AS emp_tel, NOW() AS DATE, #{product_code} AS product_code, #{product_name} AS product_name, #{product_country} AS product_country, #{product_business} AS product_business, #{product_price} AS product_price, #{quantity} AS quantity FROM statement
